pages.text: Difficulty can be set to the player's preference to adjust the $(l)scaling$() of $(l:the_vault/mobs)$(l)mobs$().$(br2)This changes their $(l)health$() and $(l)damage$(), and does $(l)not$() scale $(l)loot$() found within Vaults. This is done in a separate $(l:useful_commands/gamerule_commands#vaultloot)$(t:Gamerule: vaultLoot)$(l)gamerule$().$(br2)Starting at $(l)Hard$() difficulty, $(l)Vault Fighters$() may occassionally throw $(l)bricks$() at the player.
